Vim

å¯¹äºç¨‹åºå‘˜æ¥è¯´ï¼Œvim æ˜¯éå¸¸å¥½ç”¨çš„ç¼–è¾‘å™¨ ğŸ‘

é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶~/.vim/vimrc

yntax on
set number
set cursorline
set showcmd
set wrap
set wildmenu
set hlsearch
exec "nohlsearch"
set incsearch
set ignorecase
set smartcase

noremap <LEADER><CR> :nohlearch<CR>

call plug#begin()
Plug 'vim-airline/vim-airline'
Plug 'connorholyday/vim-snazzy'
call plug#end()

color snazzy

let g:SnazzyTransparent = 1
